description.ko: 중력과 빛이 불가능한 천체 건축을 만들어내는 우주 깊은 곳에 대한 웅장하고도 경외감을 주는 시선입니다.
description.en: A grand, terrifying look into the depths of space, where gravity and light create impossible celestial architecture.

prompt: A colossal cosmic gate formed by gravitational lensing, pillars made of compressed #3D1A78 starlight and #0D0221 dark matter filaments. Surrounded by a massive event horizon and swirling #7B68EE nebulous gas. Cosmic horror majesty on an infinite scale. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations, global illumination from a distant #E6E6FA pulsar. Detailed textures of stardust and the silent majesty of the abyss.
